column6:
This posting is a catch all for all of my listings, it's available on a case by case basis, so message me for customized requests!

-1 min highway access located on a quiet cul-de-sac
-Full private bathroom 
-Entertainment-centric child-free pet-free comfort setting(I don't have pets but you may bring yours)
-DIRECTV w/ NFL Sunday Ticket
-Living room with 70'' TV

Connect with me on my LinkedIn page:
Search for Grant Glass
